H0.text: The right lobe of the liver is near the gallbladder.

H1.text: The left lobe of the liver is the lobe near which the gallbladder is located.

H2.text: Central lobe is the lobe of the liver near which the gallbladder is located.

H3.text: The internal lobe is the lobe of the liver near which the gallbladder is located.

A4.text: The gallbladder lies in a shallow depression below the right lobe of the liver.
